column4: hi there need help with something im trying to install ubuntu on my eee pc but when i try to connect the internet throw wireless the computer blocks. Does anyone knows how to fix this?
ok so its a asus eee 1001px, im trying to install ubuntu 11.04 it happens on installation too
btw its not just on ubuntu thus occurs on other distrso too like fedora backtrack?
i updated using cable everything ok then i tried to connect throw wireleess puff blocked again
cause i gave up so im trying again now
which eeepc? Which release? Are you fully updated?
use a wired link and get fully updated. May help
do you have the latest bios?
yes, if the RAM is bad it can cause issues
do you have the latest BIOS? It may be an issue fixed with that
yes or you can use dxdiag, I believe it says there. You may also want to websearch: eee pc fix ubuntu    there are little extre steps to take with each model to make it work well
you have enough stuff to keep you busy now ;-). Could also try oneiric livecd, see if it plays nice with the new kernel etc. Its in beta currently
Natty is 11.04  oneiric is 11.10 due release at the e
